scripts.clone_to_s: ssh asmi@213.139.210.68 " cd www && git clone -b master https://github.com/asmi046/autoprioritet-nuxt"
scripts.pull_to_s: ssh asmi@213.139.210.68 " cd www && cd autoprioritet-nuxt && git pull https://github.com/asmi046/autoprioritet-nuxt"
scripts.build_in_s: ssh asmi@213.139.210.68 "cd www && cd autoprioritet-nuxt && npm run build"
scripts.npmi_in_s: ssh asmi@213.139.210.68 "cd www && cd autoprioritet-nuxt && npm i"
scripts.stop_in_s: ssh asmi@213.139.210.68 "cd www && cd autoprioritet-nuxt && pm2 stop site-start"
scripts.start_in_s: ssh asmi@213.139.210.68 "cd www && cd autoprioritet-nuxt && pm2 start site-start"
scripts.restart_in_s: ssh asmi@213.139.210.68 "cd www && cd autoprioritet-nuxt && pm2 restart site-start"
scripts.deploy: npm run stop_in_s && npm run pull_to_s && npm run build_in_s && npm run restart_in_s && npm run start_in_s
